* ----- ------ -------------------- ------- --------- ------------------------------
*  REG   DATA         ACCESS        READ OR  DEVICE
* INDEX  VALUE         TYPE          WRITE   ADDRESS  COMMENT (for information only)
* ----- ------ -------------------- ------- --------- ------------------------------
  ******************************** Sets DSP3 clock, sample rate and SYS clock *******************************
  0x1300 0x0014 SMbus_32inx_16dat     Write  0x34      * DSP3 Control 1(1300H):   0014  DSP3_RATE=Sample Rate 1, DSP3_MEM_ENA=1, DSP3_DBG_CLK_ENA=0, DSP3_SYS_ENA=1, DSP3_CORE_ENA=0, DSP3_START=0
  0x1301 0x0006 SMbus_32inx_16dat     Write  0x34      * DSP3 Clocking 1(1301H):  0006  DSP3_CLK_SEL=147.456MHz (135.4752MHz)
